participant_2.background:
I love to watch romantic comedies with my family because they make us laugh and feel good.
I usually start my day with a workout to get my body moving and my mind sharp.
I grew up in the Midwest, where Christmas is a big deal.
I remember spending hours reading books in the library with my mom when I was a kid.
I've had to give up a lot of my friends to pursue my dream of filmmaking.

content.text: I'm a sucker for romantic comedies. They always put me in a good mood.
I love romantic comedies too! They're so funny and heartwarming.
I know, right? They're the perfect way to relax after a long day.
I totally agree. I always put one on after work.
That's a tough question. I love so many of them.
Me too. I think I'm going to have to go with When Harry Met Sally.
That's a great choice! It's one of my favorites too.
I love the chemistry between Meg Ryan and Billy Crystal.
Me too! They're so perfect together.
I also love the way the movie shows the evolution of their relationship.
I've seen it a million times and it never gets old.
Me neither! I love watching it every time.
I'm glad we agree! It's one of the best romantic comedies of all time.
